title: Forcing husband to live in separate room is cruelty, says Allahabad High Court granting divorce
selftext: ‘’Cruelty is to be taken as a behaviour by one spouse towards the other, which causes reasonable apprehension in the mind of the latter that it is not safe for him or her to continue the matrimonial relationship with the other… mental cruelty is a is a state of mind and feeling with one of the spouses due to the behaviour or behavioural pattern by the other,’’ the court said in a recent judgement.
